javadoc.text: * All conditions checks that fail due to a {@code null} argument must throw * this exception. * This class is meant to signal a precondition violation ("null is an illegal * argument") and so does not extend the standard {@code NullPointerException}. * Propagation of {@code NullPointerException} from within Commons-Math is * construed to be a bug.

javadoc.param: pattern Message pattern providing the specific context of * the error.
arguments Values for replacing the placeholders in {@code pattern}.
